ios.step2: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'

android.title: For Android:

android.step2: Select 'Add to Home screen' or 'Install app'

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about our mission to provide the best video downloading experience

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that everyone should have the ability to save and enjoy their favorite videos offline. Our platform is designed to make video downloading simple, fast, and accessible to everyone.
mission.commitment: We are committed to providing a free, secure, and user-friendly service that respects your privacy while delivering the highest quality downloads.

quality.title: High Quality
quality.description: Download videos in the highest available quality, including HD and 4K resolutions when available.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Our optimized servers ensure that your downloads are processed and delivered as quickly as possible.

security.title: Secure & Private
security.description: Your privacy is our priority. We don't store your personal data or track your downloads.

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: All our services are completely free with no hidden costs, registration requirements, or limitations.

technology.title: Technology & Innovation
technology.description: Built with cutting-edge web technologies to ensure reliability, speed, and cross-platform compatibility.

modern.title: Modern Web App
modern.description: Progressive Web App technology for native-like experience

optimized.title: Performance Optimized
optimized.description: Optimized algorithms for fastest processing times

support.title: What We Support
support.description: Our platform supports a wide range of video formats and platforms to meet all your downloading needs.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions or need support? We're here to help you with any issues or feedback.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us. Learn how we protect and handle your data.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We are committed to collecting only the minimal information necessary to provide our video downloading service:

items.urls: Video URLs you submit for processing (temporarily cached for processing only, automatically deleted within 24 hours)
items.usage: Anonymous usage statistics including download counts and popular video formats (no personal identification)
items.device: Technical information such as browser type, device type, and IP address for security, compatibility, and fraud prevention
items.preferences: Your language preferences and settings (stored locally on your device)
items.errors: Error logs and diagnostic information to improve service reliability (automatically anonymized)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.description: The information we collect is used exclusively for the following legitimate purposes:

processing.title: Video Processing & Download
processing.description: To retrieve, process, and deliver video content in your requested format and quality

improvement.title: Service Enhancement
improvement.description: To analyze anonymous usage patterns, improve download speeds, and add new features based on user needs

security.title: Security & Fraud Prevention
security.description: To protect our service from abuse, detect unusual activity, and ensure system security

legal.title: Legal Compliance
legal.description: To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and respond to lawful requests from authorities

dataStorage.title: Data Storage, Security & Retention
dataStorage.description: We implement robust security measures and strict data retention policies to protect your information:

security.title: Security Measures
security.description: All data is encrypted in transit using SSL/TLS. We use secure servers with regular security updates and monitoring. No video content is permanently stored on our servers.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: Video URLs: Deleted immediately after processing completion (maximum 1 hour). Usage statistics: Aggregated and anonymized, retained for 12 months. Error logs: Automatically purged after 30 days.

location.title: Data Location
location.description: Our servers are located in secure data centers with SOC 2 compliance. Data processing occurs in accordance with applicable privacy laws.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services & Data Sharing
thirdParty.description: We may use carefully selected third-party services to enhance our platform. We do not sell your personal information:

items.apis: Video platform APIs (TikTok, etc.) for content retrieval - only video URLs are shared, no personal data
items.analytics: Privacy-focused analytics services (anonymized data only) to understand service usage patterns
items.cdn: Content delivery networks to improve download speeds and reliability
items.security: Security services for DDoS protection and threat detection
items.hosting: Cloud hosting providers with strict data protection agreements

thirdParty.noSale: We never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

userRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
userRights.description: You have important rights regarding your personal information under applicable privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA, etc.):

access.title: Right to Know
access.description: Request information about what personal data we collect and how we use it

deletion.title: Right to Delete
deletion.description: Request deletion of your personal information (note: most data is automatically deleted)

portability.title: Right to Portability
portability.description: Request a copy of your data in a machine-readable format

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.description: Object to certain types of data processing, including analytics

userRights.exercise: To exercise these rights, contact us using the information below. We will respond within 30 days as required by law.

cookies.title: Cookies & Local Storage
cookies.description: We use minimal cookies and local storage to provide essential functionality and improve your experience:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic site functionality, security, and remembering your preferences (cannot be disabled)

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how our service is used to improve performance (can be disabled in your browser)

functional.title: Functional Storage
functional.description: Stores your language preference, download history, and settings locally on your device

cookies.manage: You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings. Disabling certain cookies may affect site functionality.

legal.title: Legal Basis & Compliance
legal.description: Our processing of your personal data is based on the following legal grounds:

legitimate.title: Legitimate Interest
legitimate.description: Processing necessary for our legitimate interests in providing and improving our service

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: Where you have given clear consent for specific processing activities

contract.title: Contract Performance
contract.description: Processing necessary to provide the video downloading service you requested

legal.compliance: We comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other applicable privacy regulations. EU users have additional rights under GDPR.

minors.title: Children's Privacy
minors.description: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately so we can delete such information.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.description: Your information may be processed in countries other than your own. We ensure adequate protection through standard contractual clauses and other appropriate safeguards as required by applicable law.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, want to exercise your rights, or have concerns about our data practices:

email.title: Privacy Officer
email.description: For privacy-related inquiries, data requests, and complaints

contact.address: You may also contact us by mail at: TT HD Video Saver Privacy Team, [Address to be updated with actual business address]
contact.response: We will respond to all privacy-related inquiries within 30 days as required by applicable law.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or other factors. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the updated policy on this page with a new effective date. Continued use of our service after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our video downloader service

noResults.title: No Results Found
noResults.description: Try adjusting your search terms or browse by category.

contact.title: Still Need Help?
contact.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team for personalized assistance.

general.q1: What is TT HD Video Saver?
general.a1: TT HD Video Saver is a free online tool that allows you to download TikTok videos in high quality without watermarks. Simply paste the TikTok video URL and download in your preferred format.
general.q2: How do I remove watermarks from TikTok videos?
general.a2: Our service automatically removes TikTok watermarks during the download process. Just paste the video URL and select the 'No Watermark' option to get clean videos without any TikTok branding.
general.q3: Is this service safe and legal to use?
general.a3: Yes, our service is completely safe to use. We don't store your personal information or downloaded content. However, please respect copyright laws and only download videos you have permission to use.
general.a4: Our service works on all devices including computers, smartphones, and tablets. It's compatible with all modern browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
general.q5: Do I need to create an account?
general.a5: No account registration is required. Our service is completely free and doesn't require any sign-up process. Just visit our website and start downloading immediately.

downloading.q1: How do I download a TikTok video?
downloading.a1:
1. Copy the TikTok video URL from the app or website
2. Paste the URL into our input field
3. Click 'Get Video' to process
4. Choose your preferred quality and format
5. Click 'Download' to save the video
downloading.q2: What video formats and qualities are available?
downloading.a2: We offer multiple formats including MP4 for videos and MP3 for audio-only downloads. Quality options include HD (1080p), Standard (720p), and Mobile (480p) depending on the original video quality.
downloading.q3: Can I download TikTok videos as MP3 audio files?
downloading.a3: Yes! You can extract audio from TikTok videos and download them as high-quality MP3 files. This is perfect for downloading music or audio content from TikTok.
downloading.q4: Can I download multiple videos at once?
downloading.a4: Currently, our service processes one video at a time to ensure optimal quality and speed. You can download multiple videos by processing them individually.
downloading.a5: No, there are no daily download limits. You can download as many TikTok videos as you want, completely free of charge.
downloading.q6: Can I download private TikTok videos?
downloading.a6: No, our service can only download publicly available TikTok videos. Private videos require special permissions that we don't have access to.
downloading.q7: Can I download TikTok live streams?
downloading.a7: No, our service is designed for downloading regular TikTok videos. Live streams cannot be downloaded as they are real-time broadcasts.
downloading.q8: Why is my download taking so long?
downloading.a8: Download speed depends on your internet connection and the video size. HD videos take longer to process and download. If you're experiencing unusual delays, try refreshing the page and trying again.

technical.q1: What should I do if the download fails?
technical.a1:
If a download fails, try these steps:
1. Check that the TikTok URL is valid and the video is public
2. Refresh the page and try again
3. Try a different browser
4. Check your internet connection
5. Contact support if the problem persists
technical.a2: Our service works best with modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and Opera. We recommend keeping your browser updated to the latest version for optimal performance.
technical.q3: Does this work on mobile devices?
technical.a3: Yes! Our service is fully responsive and works perfectly on mobile devices. You can download TikTok videos directly to your phone or tablet using any mobile browser.
technical.a4: Downloaded videos are saved to your device's default download folder. On mobile devices, check your Downloads app or Photos app. You can usually change the download location in your browser settings.
technical.q5: Why is the video quality lower than expected?
technical.a5: Video quality depends on the original TikTok video quality. If the original was uploaded in lower quality, we cannot enhance it beyond that. We always provide the highest quality available from the source.
technical.q6: Is there any risk of viruses or malware?
technical.a6: No, our service is completely safe. We don't require any software downloads or installations. Everything is processed through your web browser, ensuring your device stays secure.
technical.q7: Why can't I access the service in my country?
technical.a7: Our service is available worldwide. If you're having trouble accessing it, the issue might be temporary or related to your internet provider. Try using a different network or contact support for assistance.
